sense.name: a serving of a beverage
sense.examples: The waitress brought us our drinks first. The banquet table was laden with food and drink. We had a couple of drinks at the lakeside bar. They only served non-alcoholic drinks at the picnic.

sense.name: the excessive imbibing of alcohol
sense.examples: Many alcoholics first take to drink as teenagers. Drink was his downfall. It was a face worn with years of drink and debauchery.

sense.name: the act of swallowing liquid
sense.examples: The baby wanted another drink of juice from his bottle. The horse took a long drink of water at the trough. He took a drink from the whiskey bottle and passed it around.

sense.name: large deep body of water, e.g, the sea
sense.examples: If you fall into the drink you may drown. She stood on deck and threw the necklace overboard into the drink.
